AzureManagedIdentityAuthenticationProvid.summary: This class implements and provides active directory managed identity authentication support.

ctor.param: Number of seconds to wait for a response from the Managed Identity service endpoint when attempting a retry. The default is 0, i.e. no timeout is applied.
Maximum number of retries when the Managed Identity service endpoint is unreachable. By default, the driver retries 5 times.
An instance of to be used by this authentication provider.

AcquireTokenAsync.param: The Active Directory authentication parameters passed to authentication providers.
AcquireTokenAsync.summary: Acquires a security token from the Managed Identity service endpoint.
AcquireTokenAsync.returns: Represents an asynchronous operation that returns the authentication token.

IsSupported.summary: Indicates whether the specified authentication method is supported.
IsSupported.returns: if the specified authentication method is supported; otherwise, .
